rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
来自人类胎儿脑组织的 3D 迷你器官开启了大脑研究的新领域科学家们利用人类胎儿脑组织开发出可在体外自组织的 3D 微型器官。这些实验室培养的类器官开辟了研究大脑如何发育的全新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/3D-mini-organs-from- human-fetal-brain-tissue-unlock-new-frontier-in-brain-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/3D-mini-organs-from- human-fetal-brain-tissue-unlock-new-frontier-in-brain-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5c46ea0-085d-4d9d-81ef-e885119a83a0 Mon, 08 Jan 2024 20:04:48 -0500 3D mini-organs from human fetal brain tissue unlock new frontier in brain research
研究发现 Epstein-Barr 病毒 T 细胞在早期多发性硬化症中普遍存在UTHealth Houston 领导的一项研究表明，早期多发性硬化症患者的脑脊液中大量存在针对 Epstein-Barr 病毒感染细胞的特异性 T 细胞，这表明 EBV 与该疾病之间存在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Study-finds-Epstein-Barr-virus-T-cells-prevalent-in-early-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Study-finds-Epstein-Barr-virus-T-cells-prevalent-in-early-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33b45a4e-d784-48cb-979e-11cf51157a78 Mon, 08 Jan 2024 20:01:00 -0500 Study finds Epstein-Barr virus T-cells prevalent in early multiple sclerosis
瓶装水中含有 25 万个微小塑料颗粒，构成未知的健康风险研究人员发现，每升瓶装水中平均含有 240,000 个纳米塑料颗粒，远远超出了之前的估计，这引起了人们对其侵入人体细胞并由于其能够穿过生物屏障而影响健康的可能性的担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Bottled-water-harbors-a-quarter-of-a-million-tiny- Plastic-articles-pose-unknown-health-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Bottled-water-harbors-a-quarter-of-a-million-tiny- Plastic-articles-pose-unknown-health-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dae0606d-ae2e-459f-952e-adcf56d54a3d Mon, 08 Jan 2024 19:19:00 -0500 Bottled water harbors a quarter of a million tiny plastic particles, posing unknown health risks
新的肽库为靶向难以捉摸的癌症因子 MYC 铺平了道路研究人员开发了第二代NTB双环肽库，鉴定出NT-B2R，这是一种有效靶向MYC（大多数人类癌症的关键因子）的肽，展示了其抑制MYC转录活性和癌细胞增殖的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/New-peptide-library-paves-the-way-for-targeting-elusive-cancer-factor-MYC.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/New-peptide-library-paves-the-way-for-targeting-elusive-cancer-factor-MYC.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3612d4b-b2d1-42e1-b9e7-d6f3ebbedfd2 Mon, 08 Jan 2024 18:48:00 -0500 New peptide library paves the way for targeting elusive cancer factor MYC
科学家揭示肠道细菌隐藏的呼吸机制研究探索了不同肠道细菌对呼吸电子受体的使用，揭示了一种与肠道代谢组和微生物能量代谢相关的新型无氧呼吸。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Scientists-unveil-the-hidden-respiratory-mechanisms-of-gut-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Scientists-unveil-the-hidden-respiratory-mechanisms-of-gut-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25ee59b3-3e43-4940-b364-95f90efadf1f Mon, 08 Jan 2024 18:31:00 -0500 Scientists unveil the hidden respiratory mechanisms of gut bacteria
新冠疫情带来的隐性损失：劳累后不适如何影响骨骼肌？研究调查了长期新冠患者劳累后不适的病理生理学，揭示了骨骼肌变化、运动能力下降、代谢紊乱和组织改变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Long-COVIDs-hidden-toll-How-does-post-exertional-malaise-affect-skeletal-muscles.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Long-COVIDs-hidden-toll-How-does-post-exertional-malaise-affect-skeletal-muscles.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50403432-0e71-4fee-b234-d07f244ffc43 Mon, 08 Jan 2024 18:10:00 -0500 Long COVID's hidden toll: How does post-exertional malaise affect skeletal muscles?
弥合数字鸿沟：更好的互联网接入能否改善美国的心理保健？研究分析了美国各县宽带互联网接入与心理健康资源可用性之间的相关性，揭示了心理医疗接入的显着差异，特别是在宽带有限的地区。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Bridging-the-digital-divide-Can-better-internet-access-improve-mental-healthcare-in-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Bridging-the-digital-divide-Can-better-internet-access-improve-mental-healthcare-in-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1260082c-8f80-429a-9eca-dd7564c421b3 Mon, 08 Jan 2024 17:54:00 -0500 Bridging the digital divide: Can better internet access improve mental healthcare in the U.S.?
电子烟比传统尼古丁替代疗法更有效戒烟由马萨诸塞大学阿默斯特分校公共卫生和健康政策研究员共同领导的最新 Cochrane 综述显示，尼古丁电子烟比传统尼古丁替代疗法 (NRT) 更能有效帮助人们戒烟。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/E-香烟-more- effective-for-smoking-cessation-than-conventional-nicotine-replacement-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/E-香烟-more- effective-for-smoking-cessation-than-conventional-nicotine-replacement-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf472724-8dc2-4de5-9839-7d29f38fe29f Mon, 08 Jan 2024 13:10:12 -0500 E-cigarettes more effective for smoking cessation than conventional nicotine-replacement therapy
研究表明，年龄在血管性血友病的诊断中起着至关重要的作用RCSI 医学与健康科学大学在《血液》杂志上发表的新研究表明，接受血管性血友病 (VWD)（一种常见出血性疾病）检测的年龄会显着影响诊断结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Age-plays-a-ritic-role-in-the-diagnosis-of-von-Willebrand-disease-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Age-plays-a-ritic-role-in-the-diagnosis-of-von-Willebrand-disease-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c2a3e05-5e5e-496a-ac80-d8e39d3f7458 Mon, 08 Jan 2024 13:01:32 -0500 Age plays a critical role in the diagnosis of von Willebrand disease, study reveals
研究探讨情绪健康与主观健康之间的因果关系芬兰于韦斯屈莱大学进行的一项研究表明，情绪和生活满意度与人们的健康体验有关。人们发现情绪健康可以预测 11 年后的主观健康状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Study-explores-the-causal-links- Between-emotional-well-being-and-subjective-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240108/Study-explores-the-causal-links- Between-emotional-well-being-and-subjective-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27af441c-296c-4d92-a803-0bb2ff607d26 Mon, 08 Jan 2024 12:57:07 -0500 Study explores the causal links between emotional well-being and subjective health
